alert.note: Alert for Southampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 5:23PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Northampton, northwestern Hertford, northwestern Gates and southeastern Southampton Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 523 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Conway, or 8 miles southwest of Boykins, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Murfreesboro, Boykins, Chowan University, Conway, Como, Severn, Pendleton, Handsom, Riddicksville, Sunbeam, Bartonsville, Riverdale, Wyanoke, Barretts Crossroad and Galatia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
